title: Calculate Net Effective Rent
description: A tenant's agent must compare two different lease proposals by calculating the Net Effective Rent for each.

tasks.description: Gather the terms for each proposal, including the base rent, term length, free rent period, and tenant improvement allowance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary variables for the calculation.

tasks.description: For each proposal, calculate the total value of all concessions (free rent + TI allowance).
tasks.expected_outcome: The total value of concessions is accurately calculated.

tasks.description: Calculate the Net Effective Rent per square foot, which represents the true economic value of the lease, and advise the tenant on which proposal is financially better.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, apples-to-apples comparison of the two proposals.
